titleStmt.title: Mr. Culpepper's Treatise of aurum potabile Being a description of the three-fold world, viz. elementary celestial intellectual containing the knowledge necessary to the study of hermetick philosophy. Faithfully written by him in his life-time, and since his death, published by his wife.
titleStmt.author: Culpeper, Nicholas, 1616-1654.

titleStmt.title: Mr. Culpepper's Treatise of aurum potabile Being a description of the three-fold world, viz. elementary celestial intellectual containing the knowledge necessary to the study of hermetick philosophy. Faithfully written by him in his life-time, and since his death, published by his wife.
titleStmt.author: Culpeper, Nicholas, 1616-1654.
Culpeper, Nicholas, 1616-1654. Mr Culpepper's Ghost.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for George Eversden, at the Mayden-head in St. Pauls-Church yard,

notesStmt.note: The words "Elimentary ... intellectuall" are enclosed in brackets on title page.
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2494 has pages tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine, London.
